attributes.action: Remove the ulez scheme and sack Sadiq khan
attributes.additional_details: No one else can voice this matter
attributes.background: We want the ulez scheme to be removed it has destroyed the motor industry prices have sky rocketed. Also, it is way more expensive to run and drive a vehicle in London.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the London Assembly and the London Mayor.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

We also can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for elected representatives to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
